nodes.text: Meetles were arthropods known to inhabit the sewer systems of the Meatlump Hideout beneath the streets of the city Coronet on Corellia. Although they closely resembled kreetles in appearance, Chef Schlump referred to the meetles as rodents. The Meatlump Gang was known to stomp on the meetles and worrmps infesting their hideout, and use their juices to create Meatlump wine, a preferred drink of the Meatlump King.

Meetles first appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Meetles were added to the game as part of the "Meatlumps Theme Park", introduced with "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
